## Fall 2013:


This year I co-taught the entire phylogenetics portion (tree building and tree using) with NIMBioS postdoc [Jeremy Beaulieu](http://www.jeremybeaulieu.org/). My slides (451 slides in total): Keynote ([206 MB](http://brianomeara.info/sites/default/files/OMearaPhylogenetics_Fall2013.key)), PDF ([61.1 MB](http://brianomeara.info/sites/default/files/OMearaPhylogenetics_Fall2013.pdf))
